english.segment1: Everyday it's the same thing; another trend has begun. Hey kids, this might be the one. It's a race to be noticed and it's leaving us numb. Hey kids, we can't be the ones
english.segment2: With all of our fashion we're still incomplete. The God of redemption could break our routine
english.segment3: There's a new way to be human. It's nothing we've ever been. There's a new way to be human. New way to be human
english.segment4: And where is our inspiration when all the heroes are gone?. Hey kids, could we be the ones?
english.segment5: 'Cause nobody's famous and nobody's fine. We all need forgiveness; we're longing inside
english.segment6: There's a new way to be human. It's nothing we've ever been. There's a new way to be human. It's spreading under my skin. There's a new way to be human. Where divinity blends. With a new way to be human. New way to be human
english.segment7: You're throwing your love across my impossible space. You have created me. Take me out of me into a new way to be human. To a new way to be human
english.segment8: You're a new way to be human. Where my humanity bends. To a new way to be human. Redemption begins
english.segment9: You're a new way to be human. You're a new way to be human. You're the only way to be human. You're a new way to be human.
